Title: Advanced ListBox
Description: Winforms ListBox control supporting highlighting parts of items based on a filter, sorting, filtering, and automatic multi-column resizing.
HomeWiki:
This project goal was to add simple highlighting of letters in listbox items based on a filter. Additional features include, multi-column autosizing, list sorting, list filtering, and auto-selection of items based on the filter.

This project also includes a tool for demoing and testing the library.
